segments.text: Hello , I've got to get up early tomorrow , so please give me a wake-up call .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course . We can give you a call anytime you like .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Actually , I need two calls , one at 7 and the other at 7 fifteen .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your wish is our command . Expect a call at 7 , and another one at 7 fifteen .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wait a minute ! I don't like 7 fifteen , now that I think about it . Change it to 7 thirty .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The second call is now changed to 7 thirty . Is there anything else we can help you with ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Nothing that I can think of right now . If something comes up , though , I'll call you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We're here all night long if you need anything .
segments.speaker: S2
